Package valorless.valorlessutils.gui

Class GUI.Page

java.lang.Object
valorless.valorlessutils.gui.GUI.Page
Enclosing class:
GUI
public class GUI.Page extends Object
Represents a page within the GUI consisting of multiple rows.
